mapper.insert: insert into public_play (play_id, play_name, play_price, play_state, staff_id) values (#{playId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{playName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{playPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{playState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{staffId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select play_id, play_name, play_price, play_state, staff_id from public_play
